Caligni dancers serve as intermediaries between caligni factions, carrying messages and negotiating deals between the notoriously independent groups. Although physically fragile, the dancers serve an important role within caligni society and are rarely seen without guards. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 15 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10 [Caligni Dancer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2862) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 48 1.1 **Perception** +6; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [light blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=68) **Languages** [Caligni](/Languages.aspx?ID=28) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +8, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +7 **Str** +0 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** -1 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +3 **Items** baton (functions as [light mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=360)), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) --- **AC** 17 **Fort** +7 **Ref** +9 **Will** +4 **HP** 18 (final dance) **Distracting Frolic** ([fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=612), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Trigger** An ally within 10 feet of the dancer rolls a saving throw against a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647) or [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=629) effect; **Effect** The target ally can roll the save twice and take the better result.
**Final Dance** ([occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=662), [shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=693), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727)) When the dancer dies, their body dissolves into a swirling mass of darkness and light. All creatures in a 10-foot emanation must succeed at a DC 17 Will save or be [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=65) for 1d4 rounds. The dancer's possessions are left in a pile where they died. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** baton +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning **Melee** dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4 piercing **Ranged** dagger +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4 piercing **Occult Innate Spells** DC 16 - **Cantrips (1st)** [Courageous Anthem](/Spells.aspx?ID=1763) - **1st** [Counter Performance](/Spells.aspx?ID=381) (visual only) **Dancer's Curse** ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The caligni dancer touches a foe and curses it. If the target fails a DC 18 Will save, it gains [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) and [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=94). The target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours. These conditions persist until the curse is removed. The victim can attempt a new DC 18 Will save once per hour to end the curse. **Sneak Attack** The caligni dancer deals 1d6 extra precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.
